item.title: Starting Over (movie)
item.description: ##21:52 Saturday 07 March 2015 JST## We watched Starting Over at Jon and Paola’s. It’s a comedy romance, but pretty good, though JP were like “it’s not going to win any Oscars..” I liked the student; he reminded me of Ferris Bueller, though I barely remember that movie.
